ext_descriptions.ext_description:
The effectivity_item type is an extensible list of alternate entity data types. It enables the association of an Effectivity to instances of the entity data types included in the types that extend the effectivity_item type.
The effectivity_item type shall be extended in application modules that uses the constructs of the present module.
An Effectivity_assignment is the association of an Effectivity with product or activity data.
The instance of the Effectivity entity that is assigned.
the set of effectivity_item whose effectivity is characterized by this entity.
